item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事美洲
item.description: 早上好。由于全球正在消化美联储昨天的评论以及国内的担忧，欧洲股市和债券交易走低，而美国 500 指数和纳斯达克 100 指数将继续刷新历史新高。在企业界，马斯克 560 亿美元的薪酬方案即将获得批准。【原文：Good morning. European stocks and bonds are trading lower as the world digests yesterday’s commentary from the Fed as well as concerns closer to home, while the S&P 500 and Nasdaq 100 are set to extend record highs. In the corporate world, Musk is on course to have his $56 billion pay package ratified. — Morwenna Coniam】

item.title: 捷克央行行长预计六月就放缓降息进行辩论
item.description: 捷克央行行长表示，在过去三次会议上将利率下调半个百分点之后，捷克决策者很可能在本月讨论放缓货币宽松政策的步伐。【原文：Czech policymakers are likely to discuss slowing the pace of monetary easing this month after cutting interest rates by half a percentage point at the last three meetings, according to the central bank governor.】

item.title: 塞尔维亚自 2020 年以来首次降息，通胀加剧
item.description: 塞尔维亚自 2020 年以来首次下调借贷成本，此前通胀率回到了央行的目标范围，欧洲央行也率先采取了宽松货币政策。【原文：Serbia cut borrowing costs for the first time since 2020 after inflation returned to the central bank’s target range and the European Central Bank led the way with monetary easing.】

item.title: 私人借贷者以创纪录的速度冲击公共债券市场
item.description: 黑石集团（Blackstone Inc. 和 Ares Management Corp. 等公司支持的一批私人信贷基金找到了一个廉价的融资渠道，而此时它们的现金已达到创纪录的水平：投资级企业债券市场。【原文：A group of private credit funds backed by firms like Blackstone Inc. and Ares Management Corp. have found a cheap place to raise money, at a time when they already have record levels of cash: the investment-grade corporate bond market.】

item.title: Alchem 因涉嫌胃药卡特尔遭到欧盟投诉
item.description: Alchem International 因涉嫌与竞争对手合谋操纵治疗胃病的药物中一种关键成分的价格而遭到正式反垄断投诉。【原文：Alchem International has been hit with a formal antitrust complaint for allegedly plotting with rivals to fix prices of a key ingredient in drugs used for stomach complaints.】

item.title: 法国兴业银行股票和信贷投资者观点迥异
item.description: 法国兴业银行（Societe Generale SA）的股票和信用违约掉期对投资者对该银行未来的看法大相径庭。【原文：Societe Generale SA shares and credit default swaps are painting a very different picture of investors’ views of the bank’s future.】

item.title: MUFG 经纪公司在收到调查报告后不再担任债务承销商
item.description: 三菱日联金融集团（Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.【原文：Mitsubishi UFJ Financial Group Inc.’s investment banking venture with Morgan Stanley lost at least two bond deals in Japan after it was reported to be facing potential penalties for sharing client information.】

item.title: 欧元区以工业疲软拉开第二季度序幕
item.description: 欧元区工业生产在第二季度初意外下滑，为今年经济从 2023 年的低迷表现中回升蒙上了阴影。【原文：Euro-zone industrial production unexpectedly fell at the start of the second quarter, casting a shadow over the economy’s pickup this year from its poor performance in 2023.】

item.title: 通胀率达到 2% 目标后，秘鲁将下调利率
item.description: 在今年通胀降温速度超过预期、上个月达到央行目标之后，秘鲁可能将于周四连续第三个月下调基准利率。【原文：Peru will likely cut its benchmark interest rate for a third straight month Thursday, after inflation cooled faster than expected this year to hit the central bank’s target last month.】

item.title: 欧洲证券监管委员会称，私人金融可能成为系统性问题
item.description: 据欧洲监管机构称，直接贷款机构和收购公司可能会发展壮大，以至于有可能影响更广泛的金融体系的稳定。【原文：Direct lenders and buyout firms may grow to such an extent that they have the potential to impact the stability of the wider financial system, according to a European watchdog.】

item.title: 阿达尼的澳大利亚煤炭港获得 5 亿澳元私人信用贷款
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，控制着澳大利亚一个主要煤炭港口的阿达尼集团（Adani Group）已获得约 5 亿澳元（约合 3.33 亿美元）的私人信用贷款。【原文：The Adani Group unit that controls a major Australian coal port has obtained a private credit loan of about A$500 million ($333 million), according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 印度尼西亚和中国如何占领镍市场
item.description:
一种重要金属的供应发生了巨大变化。【原文：

A sea change in the supply of an important metal.

】

item.title: 印度股票交易量因复苏强劲而飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 在大盘强劲回升和外国买盘的推动下，印度股票交易量攀升至创纪录水平。【原文：India’s stock trading volume climbed to a record amid a strong recovery in broader market and foreign buying.】

item.title: 欧洲央行穆勒称通胀可能暂时再次加速
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员马迪斯-穆勒（Madis Muller）表示，欧元区通胀可能会再次加快，欧洲央行尚未达到 2% 的目标。【原文：Euro-area inflation could quicken again and the European Central Bank has yet to reach its 2% goal, according to Governing Council member Madis Muller.】

item.title: 津巴布韦铬铁矿工同意建设发电厂
item.description: 津巴布韦最大的用电企业--津巴布韦铬铁矿商已同意在未来两年内建设自己的发电厂，以满足政府对能源的需求。【原文：Zimbabwe’s ferrochrome miners, the nation’s biggest electricity consumers, have agreed to build their own power plants over the next two years as the government seeks to balance energy demand.】

item.title: 圣詹姆斯广场聘请前瑞士信贷银行家担任首席财务官
item.description: 圣詹姆斯广场公司任命前瑞士信贷银行家 Caroline Waddington 为新任首席财务官。【原文：St James’s Place Plc has named Caroline Waddington, an ex-Credit Suisse banker, as its new chief financial officer.】

item.title: 沙特金融科技公司 Rasan 在利雅得交易市场首次亮相即大涨 30
item.description: 沙特金融科技公司 Rasan Information Technology Co.在利雅得首次上市就募集到 8.41 亿里亚尔（约合 2.24 亿美元）的资金，在过去一个月里，沙特已有多家公司开始上市交易。【原文：Saudi fintech Rasan Information Technology Co. advanced in its Riyadh debut after raising 841 million riyals ($224 million), amid a listing spree which has seen several companies start trading in the kingdom over the past month.】

item.title: MSCI 拒绝将欧盟债券纳入主权指数后欧盟债券下跌
item.description: 欧盟债券周四下跌，因为人们对其将很快被纳入主要主权基准的押注提前受到打击。【原文：The European Union’s bonds fell on Thursday as bets they would soon be added to key sovereign benchmarks received an early blow.】

item.title: Vasle 称，在基准情景下，2024 年欧洲央行可能会有更多削减
item.description: 欧洲央行理事会成员 Bostjan Vasle 表示，如果欧洲央行对通胀进一步放缓的预期成为现实，欧元区可能会进一步降低利率。【原文：More euro-area interest-rate reductions are likely if the European Central Bank’s expectations for a further slowdown in inflation materialize, according to Governing Council member Bostjan Vasle.】

item.title: Stellantis 面临市场放缓，成本削减接近极限
item.description: 就在汽车市场放缓、回报率下降之际，Stellantis NV 大幅削减成本的努力正受到限制。【原文：Stellantis NV’s push for deep cost cuts is coming up against limits just as auto markets slow and returns flag.】

item.title: 银行客户损失 16 亿美元后，泰国严厉打击金融欺诈行为
item.description: 在过去两年中，银行客户因网上金融诈骗损失了 600 多亿泰铢（约合 16 亿美元），因此泰国央行正在加大对此类所谓 "骡子账户 "的打击力度。【原文：Thailand’s central bank is stepping up a crackdown on the so-called mule accounts used in online financial fraud after bank customers lost more than 60 billion baht ($1.6 billion) to such scams in the past two years.】

item.title: 橡树树支持的净资产贷款机构 17Capital 将进军迪拜
item.description: 橡树资本管理公司（Oaktree Capital Management）支持的 17Capital 公司正在向迪拜扩张，试图利用中东地区对资产净值贷款这一利基领域日益增长的兴趣。【原文：Oaktree Capital Management-backed 17Capital is expanding into Dubai as it seeks to capitalize on growing interest in the niche area of net-asset-value lending in the Middle East.】

item.title: 瑞典房东 SBB 计划在住房部门出售新债券
item.description: 陷入困境的瑞典房东 SBB 正准备将债券债务从母公司转移到 Sveafastigheter AB 公司，从而为其整个住宅投资组合的首次公开募股奠定基础。【原文：Struggling Swedish landlord SBB is preparing to lay the groundwork for an initial public offering of its entire residential portfolio by shifting bond debt from the parent level down into Sveafastigheter AB.】

item.title: 李克强总理访问新西兰，中国寻求加强与新西兰的关系
item.description: 在中国总理李强访问南太平洋国家的第一天，新西兰和中国承诺加强两国的经济联系，同时也承认存在分歧。【原文：New Zealand and China pledged to strengthen their economic ties even as they acknowledged disagreements during the first day of Chinese Premier Li Qiang’s visit to the South Pacific nation.】

item.title: Pimco 预计日本央行今年再加息两次，日本国债收益率将上升
item.description: 太平洋投资管理公司（Pacific Investment Management Co.【原文：Pacific Investment Management Co. expects the Bank of Japan to raise interest rates two more times this year, boosting returns on the nation’s government bonds.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：美联储余波未平，指数将跟随英镑走低
item.description: 英格兰银行（右）位于伦敦金融城的 Square Mile 金融区。摄影师：Hollie Adams/Bloomberg【原文：The Bank of England, right, in the Square Mile financial district in the City of London. Photographer: Hollie Adams/Bloomberg】

item.title: 东非预算卡上的增税和增加支出计划
item.description: 东非各国财政部长将于本周四提出支出计划，他们需要在为本已负债累累的国家提供更多贷款和促进遭受暴雨和洪水重创的经济之间取得平衡。【原文：East African finance ministers will need to strike a balance between burdening their already heavily indebted nations with more loans and boosting their economies pounded by heavy rains and flooding when they present their spending plans on Thursday.】

item.title: 开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

】

item.title: 韩国表示外汇交易改革一开始就 "不走回头路
item.description: 韩国一位高级官员强调，韩国决心确保在岸韩元交易时间的延长将是永久性的，因为韩国正在推进数十年来最大的市场改革，以争取加入全球政府债券指数。【原文：A senior South Korean official underscored the nation’s determination to ensure that its extension of trading hours for the onshore won will be permanent as it pushes for its biggest market reforms in decades in a bid to join a global government bond index.】

item.title: 大科技公司在双喜临门日再次获胜
item.description:
通胀下降了，美联储对今年降息次数的预测也下降了。华丽七侠几乎没有注意到这一点。【原文：

Inflation is down, and so are the Fed’s forecasts for the number of rate cuts this year. The Magnificent Seven barely noticed.

】
